aboutme: Welcome, I'm a Full Stack developer, passionate about technology and always looking for personal and professional growth (who doesn't like to grow, right? :P)

Like many, I started as a developer wanting to create video games, but now I develop web applications. For me, building applications is an exciting dedication because it challenges you to learn and grow professionally. I hope one day you can enjoy my creations. Who knows? It could be many things, like a video game or even this website could inspire you to create your own (if that's the case, let me know ;D).

I like discovering new things that have a positive impact on me, such as traveling. One day I hope to discover many places on this wonderful planet (you can help me achieve this goal by taking care of our planet :D)
I currently live in Barranquilla - Colombia, a festive city where people are cheerful and like to have fun as much as I do.
On this website, you will find my education, experience, projects, and much more about me. Get to know me! I also hope to get to know you.

education.name: Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje (SENA)
education.career: Analysis and Development of Computer Systems

experience.name: ISES S.A.S
experience.description: My job involved developing modules in PHP (CodeIgniter) and JavaScript (jQuery) and providing support for internal software that manages various administrative activities in all areas.

experience.name: Datafis S.A.S
experience.description: Developed various projects using PHP (Laravel), NodeJS, and NextJS, which manage the cadastre in certain municipalities in Colombia in an administrative way.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: Web App with information about 500 Pokemons
